title: We Know How the Story Ends
itunes:title: We Know How the Story Ends
description: Though we Christians do not know the story of God's providence in all its details, we do know that it is a divine comedy. This is because, in the resurrection of Jesus from the dead, we know what God intends for his whole creation. Life does indeed triumph over death; hope does indeed conquer despair; God is indeed victor and ruler.

itunes:author: Bishop Robert Barron
